<Text: The 16 September military parade in honour of the anniversary of Mexican Independence is an annual tradition dating back to the late 19th century and the beginning of the professionalisation of the Mexican Armed Forces in the 20th century.>
Triplets:<The 16 September
1:
--------------------
Text: September 16 military parade:  Held yearly in the Zócalo in Mexico City, this parade, the largest of the various parades held simultaneously nationwide on September 16, Mexican Independence Day, is presided by the President of Mexico in the fulfillment of his duty as the Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces.
Triplets:<September 16 military parade
4:
--------------------
Text: September 16 military parade:  Taking part in this are members of the Mexican Armed Forces and the Federal Police.
